name: Café Montezuma
description: Fill a London dock glass with the coffee and float the tequila on top. Carefully slide a long-handled tea spoon into the drink to warm the spoon. Remove the spoon, place the sugar cube in it, and fill it with more tequila. Light the tequila in the spoon with a lighter or matches and allow to burn for about 15 seconds. Gently touch the spoon to the surface of the drink, which should ignite the tequila floating on top. After the fire burns itself out, dunk the spoon and stir.

Strain the Scotch mixture into this glass, flame an orange peel over the top, and drop it in.
